actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Immigration and Refugee Policy.
Committee on Judiciary requested executive comment from Office of the U.S. Attorney General.
Committee on Judiciary received executive comment from Office of the U.S. Attorney General.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Immigration and Refugee Policy

official_title: A bill to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to provide for the adjustment of status to that of aliens lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence for certain alien parents of children born in the United States.

summary.text: Alien Parental Amnesty Act of 1983 - Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to direct the Attorney General to adjust to permanent resident the status of certain alien parents of U.S.-born children.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to provide for the adjustment of status to that of aliens lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence for certain alien parents of children born in the United States.
